store/contact-us-form.productInfoDesc: Product information helps make our support service faster and more efficient.
store/contact-us-form.PostillaLabel: Fields marked with an * are mandatory.
store/contact-us-form.productInfoHelpTit: How to find the serial number and model of your device?
store/contact-us-form.productInfoHelpDes: The serial number and the device code can be found on the product identification label.
The serial number is also indicated on the warranty certificate supplied with the device and the model code on the first page of the user manual.
To find the serial number and model of your device, select a product category here:
store/contact-us-form.privacySectionTitl: Consent to the processing of Personal Data
store/contact-us-form.privacyFirstPointL: a) I agree to receive personalized marketing communications relating to Whirlpool and other Whirlpool Corporation brands.
store/contact-us-form.privacySecondPoint: b) I agree to be contacted by Domestic & General Insurance PLC regarding guarantees.
